Author: Microsoft Events
Title: Train host and infer reasoning models on Microsoft Foundry | BRK210
Description:
Step through training and deploying a custom reasoning model with Azure ML and Microsoft Foundry. See the magic happen in real time and learn how to bring it to your own projects with Foundry.

Chapters: 0:00 - Customers Using AI Foundry for Real-World ROI 00:02:09 - Challenges in Moving AI from Prototype to Production 00:15:29 - Reference to Research Paper on Harnessing LLMs for Business Insights 00:17:26 - Demonstration of Financial Analyst Agent Using Foundry 00:21:40 - Introduction of Reinforcement Learning for Accuracy Improvement 00:25:37 - Comparison of RFT generalization and multitask capabilities 00:28:39 - Distinction between synchronous and asynchronous reinforcement learning techniques 00:31:32 - Evaluation pipeline comparing different fine-tuning methods and performance results 00:42:54 - Benchmarking results show improved throughput and token latency
